MainPage.about: This web application is a lightweight Postman-inspired tool for REST API testing. It enables sending HTTP requests, managing headers and variables, maintaining request history, supporting user authentication and internationalization, while also generating code snippets for popular programming languages. Built with React/TypeScript and Next.js, it utilizes Firebase for authentication.
MainPage.knowledge: Open to all (age/background/location), basic knowledge required.
MainPage.education: Free education driven by mentorship & community.
MainPage.vladimir: Vladimir from Saint-Petersburg implemented the project by initializing and configuring the setup, adding internationalization support, developing the history page and implement the REST client generation code, designing the main page UI with content, and writing test cases.
MainPage.lara: Larisa from Yaroslavl integrated Firebase-based authentication, designed key UI elements including the header, footer, and 404 page, implemented robust error handling, created a dedicated variables page, and wrote comprehensive tests for the features.
MainPage.sergey: Sergey from Rybinsk developed the REST client, implementing all related functionality without generation code.
